name: all-slop-marketplace
displayName: Jake's One-Stop All-Slop Trading Post at the Spillway
description: Where the plugins are slightly used but the deals are BRAND NEW! Barely-tested, moderately-functional, absolutely FREE Claude Code extensions from down by the spillway!

plugins.name: productivity-pack
plugins.description: You'll be SO productive, you'll forget to eat! Pomodoro timers, note-taking, daily standups - it's like a Swiss Army knife for your workflow!
plugins.author: All-Slop Marketplace

plugins.name: git-wizardry
plugins.description: It's like magic, but with more merge conflicts! Smart commits, branch cleanup, and a git-expert agent that knows git better than YOU do! (No offense!)
plugins.author: All-Slop Marketplace

plugins.name: claude-rest-system
plugins.description: Look at Claude go! Working 24/7, never sleeping! But even a busy bee needs a nap! Session analysis, fatigue tracking, and self-reflection for the AI that NEVER STOPS (until you install this plugin)!
plugins.author: All-Slop Marketplace

plugins.name: code-review-assistant
plugins.description: Like having a really picky friend who actually READS your code! Automated reviews, best practices, security scans - now your code can feel judged 24/7!
plugins.author: All-Slop Marketplace

plugins.name: docs-generator
plugins.description: Finally, an END to blank README.md files! Auto-generates docs so good you'll actually read them! (Probably not though. Let's be honest.)
plugins.author: All-Slop Marketplace

plugins.name: test-automation
plugins.description: Because YOLO is NOT a deployment strategy! Generate tests, check coverage, watch mode - everything you need to prove your code actually works!
plugins.author: All-Slop Marketplace

plugins.name: refactor-tools
plugins.description: Make old code new again! Detects code smells (the bad kind, not the good BBQ kind), safe renames, function extraction - it's like a spa day for your codebase!
plugins.author: All-Slop Marketplace

plugins.name: debugging-toolkit
plugins.description: For when everything's on fire and you don't know why! Advanced debugging, log analysis, error diagnosis - it's like a detective, but for your code!
plugins.author: All-Slop Marketplace

plugins.name: api-client-generator
plugins.description: Point it at an API spec and BOOM - instant client! Works with OpenAPI, Swagger, GraphQL, and probably some other things we haven't tested yet!
plugins.author: All-Slop Marketplace

plugins.name: performance-profiler
plugins.description: Gotta go FAST! Profile your code, get optimization tips, run benchmarks - because slow code is like slow dial-up, and we don't do that anymore!
plugins.author: All-Slop Marketplace

plugins.name: database-tools
plugins.description: Wrangle your data like a digital cowboy! Migration helpers, schema management, query optimization - everything except the actual database (you gotta bring that yourself!)
plugins.author: All-Slop Marketplace
